roadMapSection.title: 6 easy steps to do it
list: We'll find out your fears and limiting beliefs that're holding you back
We'll look for your true desires and goals, and not those that're imposed by outside persons or influences
We'll learn to celebrate the little victories and to move step by step towards the dream
We'll understand where energy goes, why 24 hours a day is not enough and how to change it
We'll find out what else you need to get the desired results and where to get it
We'll write your personal action plan for a year, quarter, month, week, day and start implementing it

heroTitle.title: I will teach you
heroTitle.subTitle: without emotional burnouts
heroTitle.supTitle: If you are emotionally burnt out

about.title: Let's get acquainted
about.caption: I know how you feel when:
text: Hello, I'm Yuliya and my motto is - to live it up! I always do what brings me pleasure and fun, I like to discover new cities, countries, continents and I can't stop doing it. For more than 7 years I have been helping start-up companies to develop and optimize their business.

My goal is to make this world a little better and increase the number of conscious happy people. That's why, since 2021, I decided to devote myself to coaching and use all my experience to help those who are lost and can't see any prospects or don't know where to start.
Together we will reveal your potential, analyze your desires and determine what slows down you along the way to your goals. And you will definitely get to know what it is to live it up!
items: It seems that everyone is more successful and happier
You are forced to do something you don't like

withCoach.title: Why it is better with a coach
text: I'll do it myself” is a common mistake of people who drive themselves and constantly face burnout…
Of course, you can do it yourself, if you find the time and energy to study all the necessary information, you will understand what you need, what are the problems and start acting.
But there is not enough time anyway, and your current knowledge has led to the current situation.

What for you need to “reinvent the wheel”, waste time, money, energy and to go all the way yourself and, besides, you don't even know whether it will be successful.  Instead, you can call for professional help and achieve results faster and easier. That's what all successful people do!

importantResultsSection.title: What are your 6 most important results?
list: You'll understand what you really want in life and start moving purposefully towards your desires
You'll begin to live a conscious and full life paying attention to important things that you previously put off or ignored
You'll gain courage and self-confidence, you'll begin to do what you couldn'tt decide on before.
You'll change your attitude towards yourself and the environment, you'll find a positive attitude that will help you to reach a new level of life
You'll increase your personal efficiency and energy level to move towards your goals
You'll fill your life with pleasure and incredible accomplishments

inLive.title: Yuliya about cardinal changes in life
text: With a change in your inner state and a new vision of your life, you'll begin to notice more opportunities, you'll stop fussing and doubting. Life will take on a new trajectory. In this state, there is no place for burnout, because in return comes the pleasure of every step! It's amazing how much we miss out in life.
If you want to understand what is stopping you from living a happy life while achieving your goals, I will be very happy to help you see how to do it.
Think that in a few months your life will shine with bright colors and you will begin to get incredible results.
Don't put off your life for later! People who live a happy life achieve the best results! Do you want to know how?
